Sonniku was taking a stroll through a factory of miasma, because he thought it would be a good fucking idea to inhale the diseased chemicals.

Tarisu was also there, rotating dat ass so his two tails could fly.

Knuckaru was following as well.

"boy this is a woNDERFUL DAY IANT IT BOYZ" Sonikku exclaimed.

"SONNIKU SHUT THE FUKC UP MY NONEXISTENT EARS" said Knuckaru.

Eggumang arrived in his infamous dickmobil. The fight was about to engage between the dictator and the anthropomorphic animals.

God my fingers, ill type the rest in a second

"STOLE YO BITCH SOMIKKU" eggu exclaimed. Eggu ran off with the emurados.

"TAIRUSU YOU FUCK BALL" Sonikku shouted.
